# Load data set and merge them

```{python}
user1=pd.read_pickle('data\\user.pkl')
user1.shape
```

```{python}
user1.head()
```

```{python}
review1=pd.read_pickle('data\\review1')
review1.shape
```

```{python}
review1.head()
```

```{python}
business1=pd.read_pickle('data\\business1')
business1.shape
```

```{python}
business1.head()
```

```{python}
#business1.groupby("categories").size().sort_values()
```

```{python}
merged=pd.merge(business1,review1,on="business_id",how="inner")
merged=pd.merge(merged,user1,on="user_id",how="inner")
```

```{python}
merged.shape
```

```{python}
merged.sort_values("review_count").head()
```

```{python}
restaurantRatings = merged.pivot_table(index=["user_id"],columns=['name_x'],values='stars')
restaurantRatings.head()
```

```{python}
#list(restaurantRatings)
```

```{python}
starWarsRatings = restaurantRatings["Yusho"]
starWarsRatings.head()

```

```{python}
similarplace = restaurantRatings.corrwith(starWarsRatings)
similarplace = similarplace.dropna()
df = pd.DataFrame(similarplace)
df.sort_values(0).tail(1000)
```

```{python}
list(df)
```

```{python}
import numpy as np
RestaurantStats = merged.groupby('name_x').agg({'stars': [np.size, np.mean]})
RestaurantStats.head()
```

```{python}
popularyelp = RestaurantStats['stars']['size'] >= 100
RestaurantStats[popularyelp].sort_values([('stars', 'mean')], ascending=False)[:15]
```

```{python}
df = RestaurantStats[popularyelp].join(pd.DataFrame(similarplace, columns=['similarity']))
```

```{python}
df.sort_values(['similarity'], ascending=False)[:150]
```
